titleStmt.title: By the King and Queen, a proclamation whereas Sir Adam Blair and Robert Grey, Doctor in physick, being charged with high treason for dispersing a treasonable paper entituled A declaration of King James the Second ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
Mary II, Queen of England, 1662-1694.
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Hampton-Court, the twenty fourth day of June, 1689, in the first year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
